events.name: Opening Ceremony
events.desc: Hey fluffy pirates! As always, we're starting off with some short yet important information for all attendees, followed by complimentary drinks with a short Meet & Greet.

events.name: Meet & Greet
events.desc:
Stick around right after the Opening
Ceremony and grab one of the complimentary
drinks from our bar! Perfect to break the ice
and get to know other attendees. Want to
show off how loud you can howl? Perfect -
we'll also have karaoke!

events.name: Karaoke
events.desc: We have both UltraStar Karaoke (where only music is heard, and you can SEE yourself sing) and KaraFun - where you can actually hear yourself sing. Karaoke will be hosted on evenings by furs passionate about it - We will keep the party flowing! Everyone is welcome, in or out of suit!

events.name: Pirate Hotel Adventure
events.desc: What pirate wouldn't want riches from all the seven seas? There are 7 posters hidden across the hotel. They'll give you clues pointing towards a treasure. If you are witty and brave enough to take on the challenge, find them all and take a selfie with each poster. Come to ConOps once you've found all seven. The fastest explorers will be rewarded!

events.name: NERF Swashbucklers Shootout
events.desc: This sea ain't big enough for two pillaging possies! Team VS Team of pirates armed to their teeth. Expect hundreds of foam darts flying! Will you survive this NERF sea shootout?

events.name: Furry Bingo
events.desc: Do you like cute furry art? Wanna win cool prizes? You'll need to focus and find matching parts of furry art on big screen and your bingo sheet. First 3 places get a prize!

events.name: Snack exchange
events.desc:
The snack exchange comes to Gdakon once again, so you can taste what other countries offer! 

Want to share your local treats, sweets and beverage? Please sign in using the signup form, so we know how many tables are needed: https://bit.ly/gdksnckexch22

events.name: The Generates Concert
events.desc: Great songs (covers) performed live by the famous polish furry band - The Generates.

events.name: Furdance
events.desc:
DJ Lineup for the evening:
21:00 - 22:30 Cody (Club Hits/EDM)
22:30 - 24:00 Krauti EDM (Eternal Dragon Music)
24:00 - 1:00 Sader (Rave/Psytrance)
Altro - Up for any backup if people would still like to party after 1:00

events.name: Bartending Workshop
events.desc: Secrets of mixing various kinds of alcohols to make the perfect drink. Come learn about the job of a bartender, what their tools are, as well as practice making real drinks yourself, under the eye of an experienced bartender! This year's theme is rum & rum-base cocktails, yarrr!

events.name: Science-Fiction and the Sea - Let's talk about literature
events.desc: A presentation on maritime science fiction - a subgenre of science fiction that is set in a maritime or naval environment. We got monsters! Pirates! And a speaker training for a PhD in this field.
events.namePl: Science-Fiction and the Sea - Let's talk about literature

events.name: Con Quiz
events.desc: Arrr you ready for ConQuiz? Together with "Follow The Quiz" we've  prepared a Kahoot Quiz with some thematic quiestions. It's a team competition, with teams of 2-8 players. To play you need a smartphone with Kahoot app installed. Good guesses earn points, good and fast guesses earn even more points. Join the competition and show your knowledge about everything pirate and sea related!

events.name: Your Cash Here
events.desc: Discussion about selling YCHs and commissions. How to do it properly, do's and don'ts when you are an artist - common mistakes, tips and tricks - anything to help you sell better or be sure you are doing all those correctly!

events.name: How to draw furries?
events.desc: If you're taking your first steps into the world of drawing furry art, be sure to drop by! We'll show you basics of perspective, creating anthro characters, facial expressions and more.

events.name: Your first Furry Con
events.desc: New here? Excited? A bit overwhelmed? We’ll help you take your first steps into the furry convention magic.

events.name: Balloon Party
events.desc: Looking for some colorful, bouncy fun? Join us for the craze at our balloon party! Inflatables and plush toys are welcome - they will make photos even better! When the party's over we can pop all the balloons! (excluding inflatables of course!)

events.name: Astronomy and Astrophotography – The secrets of space
events.desc: Have you ever looked at a photo of a nebula, galaxy, comet or other celestial body and wanted to make one on your own? Or maybe you've just gazed at the night sky and wondered... what’s up there? I’ll explain how to observe the sky, what basic equipment to buy, and how to make astro-photos!
events.namePl: Astronomy and Astrophotography – The secrets of space

events.name: Calligraphy workshop
events.desc: Teaching the basics of Western calligraphy to everyone who's up for the job. Two hours spent with a calligraphy teacher who's going to teach you the basics of holding the writing tool and the basics of uncial, texture, and humanist scripts.

events.name: Let's make a boardgame
events.desc: Card, dices and other funtastic elements of a board game mixed together create the perfect board game for this con! In this workshop you and your friends will get the materials to make a game about Pirate-themed Gdakon. You invent the rules and goals. Come over, take your friends. Who knows - maybe your game will be a new party hit?

events.name: Karaoke
events.desc: We have both UltraStar Karaoke (where only music is heard, and you can SEE yourself sing) and KaraFun - where you can actually hear yourself sing. Karaoke will be hosted on evenings by furs passionate about it - We will keep the party flowing! Everyone is welcome, in or out of suit!

events.name: Fluff Saber League Tournment
events.desc: Beat Saber competition. Individual tournament, double elimination, Best of One, Finals Best of Three. Winner takes it all! :D  The Tournament will be conducted on Quest 2 headsets.

events.name: Pirate Cruise
events.desc:
Gdakonek invited all willing to catch a glimpse of a Pirate life on his ship! Don't be late for the galleon Dragon cruise on Thursday morning.
We'll get a lift to the harbor, so make sure to be ready to leave in front of the hotel at 10:30, in fursuit or not! 

Avaliable slots are limited - fill out this form if you want to set sail aboard the galleon Dragon:
https://forms.gle/rqSaSkGnAA9nKenz6

events.name: Self-Care - fight the hangoverrrr
events.desc: Panel about taking care of yourself. We'll chill and talk about how mornings suck, while sipping drinks that help you come back from the dead

events.name: reg for Fursuit Olympics
events.desc:
Registration for Fursuit Olympics.
Please come and register yourself to take part in Fursuit Olympics

events.name: Fursuit Olympics
events.desc: Challenge other fluffy pirates to show them who's the boss of this Galleon! Prove yourself in strength, cunning and dexterity. Show us that you deserve to be called the greatest pirate of the seven seas!

events.name: Bountiful Buccaneer Bazaar                  (🍺🍷🧀)
events.desc:
(Beer, Wine & Cheese Exchange 🍺🍷🧀)
Brave Buccaneers, come 'round to the big table for a feast of flavors! Bring your favorite beer, wine or cheese and tell others what's so good 'bout it! Taste delicious cheeses, most notably the big wheel of Gouda rolled in by Birdy! Sample fine wines from other parts of the globe! Try beers brought to you from abroad! Meet new people and get to know each other in this delicious event!

events.name: BOJLEROWNIA
events.desc:
club / people / atmosphere / music / chat / lounge
Ever heard of the Boiler Room? It's a brand of live DJ club music sessions around the globe, with one characteristic feature: the DJ performing live from the center of the club. The dancefloor is seamlessly connected with a cozy lounge, where you can kick back and relax your tired paws while still soaking up the music! There is also a balcony if you need to get some fresh air, and unlike most clubs, here you're welcome to come in with your own drinks!

events.name: Practical [Beat] Sabering
events.desc:
Have you ever heard of a game that's "easy to learn, hard to master?" 
Beat Saber is one of them. It's easy to slash cubes, but improving on your own is a very long term and difficult way. It doesn't need to be! If you are interested in improving your cube cutting skills, feel free to attend this practical workshop and learn many game mechanics that you've never heard of. What is the most efficient way to play? What tricks do pro people use? These and many more questions will be answered by an experienced player and half-time coacher in a simple and approachable way.

events.name: Smol airplanes and how to fly them
events.desc: How to get a pilot's licence, basics of how to fly an airplane and why I hate gliders
events.namePl: Smol airplanes and how to fly them

events.name: Furry Bingo After Dark
events.desc: Do you like sexy furry art? Wanna win cool prizes? Like the SFW Furry Bingo event, but with added difficulty. Don't get distracted by those hotties! Focus and find matching parts of furry art on big screen and your bingo sheet. First 3 places get a prize!

events.name: Karaoke
events.desc: We have both UltraStar Karaoke (where only music is heard, and you can SEE yourself sing) and KaraFun - where you can actually hear yourself sing. Karaoke will be hosted on evenings by furs passionate about it - We will keep the party flowing! Everyone is welcome, in or out of suit!

events.name: Fursuit Electronics
events.desc: Have you ever wondered, what electronics are used in fursuits? What components to choose? On this panel I'll briefly show what electronics you can use yourself in a fursuit, what power source you can use, and I'll do a brief introduction to LED Collar Workshop

events.name: Make your own LED collar
events.desc: A Workshop in which attendees will have an opportunity to create or program his own LED Collar, controlled by a pilot. We've already had an online pre-registration for this workshop, but everyone is welcome to come over, watch, help & learn!

events.name: 15 years of fursuiting in Poland
events.desc:
This year we are celebrating 15 years since the first fursuitwalk in Poland. On this occasion, I want to invite you to a panel devoted to this event and stories related to it.
I'll share with you my personal journey from the first steps as a furry throught first furmeets and furwalks up to the first Gdakon.
You will also find out what difficulties did I encounter in building the fursuit and what materials and techniques I used.
During this event I’ll present previously unpublished videos and photos from my personal archive."

events.name: Furry Bingo After Dark
events.desc: Do you like sexy furry art? Wanna win cool prizes? Like the SFW Furry Bingo event, but with added difficulty. Don't get distracted by those hotties! Focus and find matching parts of furry art on big screen and your bingo sheet. First 3 places get a prize!

events.name: Tea-ves of the sea
events.desc: Do you know where the term 'high tea' comes from? Or generally where tea comes from? During this panel you'll get to know the ins and outs of teas, how to set them and how they taste. Take a short break during the hectic con, sit back and relax with a few cups of tea

events.name: Closing ceremony
events.desc: Everything will have to end, and Gdakon is no exception.
events.descPl: Wszystkie kiedyś się kończy, Gdakon również.

events.name: Furdance
events.desc:
DJ Lineup for the evening:
21:00 - 23:00 Whiskey (Bigroom Prohouse)
23:00 - 1:00 Altro ("Sunset Festival")
1:00 - 3:00 Boguslav (Dubstep)

events.name: Czego nie mówili Ci w szkole o podatkach [PL]
events.desc: Nie wiesz czemu dostajesz przelewy na mniej niż masz wpisane w umowie, bo na lekcjach przedsiębiorczości zamiast podatków były encykliki JP2? Spokojnie, tego czego nie powie szkoła wyjaśnią Ci furasy. Co to jest VAT, co to jest PIT i CIT, co to są umowy śmieciowe i czemu ludzie przechodzą na B2B... i w sumie co to jest B2B...? Co to jest klin podatkowy i gdzie w tym wszystkim jest ZUS. Te i kilka innych rzeczy, które powinien rozumieć świadomy obywatel będzie wyjaśnione na tej prelekcji.
events.namePl: Czego nie mówili Ci w szkole o podatkach [PL]

events.name: Karaoke
events.desc: We have both UltraStar Karaoke (where only music is heard, and you can SEE yourself sing) and KaraFun - where you can actually hear yourself sing. Karaoke will be hosted on evenings by furs passionate about it - We will keep the party flowing! Everyone is welcome, in or out of suit!

events.name: Group photo
events.desc: Gather 'round for this year's Gdakon group photo! As always, everyone will get a physical copy after the Closing Ceremony
events.descPl: Zbierzmy się do tegorocznej Gdakonowej fotki grupowej! Jak zawsze, każdy z was dostanie fizyczną kopię zdjęcia po Oficjalnym zakończeniu

events.name: Fursuitwalk
events.desc: Fursuitwalk - the Gdakon fursuiter parade! This year we'll be marching down Monte Cassino street in Sopot, with a Photoshoot on the pier
events.descPl: Fursuitwalk, czyli coroczna Gdakonowa parada fursuiterów! W tym roku odbędzie się w centrum Sopotu, wzdłuż ulicy Monte Cassino, ze zdjęciem grupowym na Sopockim molo

events.name: Feedback Panel
events.desc: A chance to meet up with Gdakon's organizers directly and share your feedback. What you liked this year? What could we improve? What are your biggest complaints? Or maybe you just want to congratulate us on another successful con? ;3
events.descPl: To idealna szansa by spotkać się z organizatorami Gdakonu i podzielić się opiniami na temat konwentu. Co ci się podobało w tegorocznej edycji? Co moglibyśmy poprawić? Co ci przeszkadzało? A może chcesz nam pogratulować kolejnego udanego konwentu? ;3

events.name: Dead Dog Party
events.desc:
You're still here? Well, what are you waiting for - join
us and end the convention with one final epic party!
